description: This file defines a custom color palette and theme configuration for a Flutter application. It includes color constants, a theme builder function that customizes various UI components such as AppBar, FloatingActionButton, InputDecoration, Card, Divider, and Chip, as well as a gradient background decoration function.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class containing static color constants used throughout the app's theme.

methods.name: buildAppTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a customized ThemeData object for the Flutter app with specific styling for app bar, buttons, input fields, cards, dividers, and chips.

methods.name: gradientBackground
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a linear gradient for background styling, featuring a blue to light gray gradient.
